analysis_metadata.notes: All data points present and consistent.

overall_summary.general_assessment: Predominantly non-compliant with significant gaps in technical controls; some strong areas in physical security and training.

themes_overview.trend: Moderate compliance; procedural gaps but overall positive.
relevant_observations: Policy approved but only confidentiality addressed.
Incident procedure exists but implementation deficient.
ISO non-compliance due to unauthorized access.

themes_overview.trend: Non-compliance; lack of account deletion and least privilege enforcement.
relevant_observations: Excessive access to clinical data by production staff.

themes_overview.trend: Non-compliance; logging and monitoring not implemented.
relevant_observations: Software does not record full traceability of changes.
Indicators defined but no ongoing monitoring.
No automatic or external backups; not encrypted.
Connections not TLS-compliant; backups legible in clear text.

themes_overview.trend: Full compliance; physical access controls in place.
relevant_observations: Physical access controls documented in laboratories and servers.
Training provided but coverage of >90% of staff not evidenced.

answer_patterns.pattern_description: Majority of controls are not met, indicating significant gaps.

remarks_analysis.tone_summary: Factual and descriptive, with emphasis on deficiencies.
insight_summary: Policy approved but only confidentiality addressed.
Excessive access to clinical data by production staff.
Software does not record full traceability of changes.
No automatic or external backups; not encrypted.
Connections not TLS-compliant; backups legible in clear text.
Physical access controls documented in laboratories and servers.
Incident procedure exists but implementation deficient.
ISO non-compliance due to unauthorized access.
Documents consolidated in a digital repository but systematization lacking.
Indicators defined but no ongoing monitoring.

data_quality.observations: Data appears complete, consistent, and coherent.

key_patterns_detected: Strong compliance in physical security and training

critical_areas.description: Observed lack of encryption in backups and communication channels.
